TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HeaderedItemsControl extends System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl

summary.span: 表示包含多个项并且具有标题的控件。

span.span: Represents a control that contains multiple items and has a header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类用于创建控件包含标题 （或标题） 和多个项。Use this class to create a control that contains a heading (or title) and multiple items. 属性可以是任何类型。The property can be any type. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 提供三个控件继承自:ships three controls that inherit from : - - - 一个具有有限的默认样式。A has a limited default style. 若要创建与自定义外观，创建一个新。To create a with a custom appearance, create a new . 设置属性指定的标签。Set the property to specify the label of the . 可以是对象的任何类型。 can be any type of object. 设置属性设置为自定义标头。Set the property to a to customize the header. 有关数据模板的详细信息，请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information about data templates, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). 该控件的依赖关系属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置为默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值时该控件将出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题使用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例创建。The following example creates a . 控件包含一个，后者标记为`TreeViewItem 1`，并且具有以下各项：The control contains a single , which is labeled `TreeViewItem 1`, and has the following items: - 一个字符串。A string. - 对象。A object. - 一个对象，其中包含在其。A object that contains a in its . - 一个对象，其属性设置为，其中包含两个对象。A object whose property is set to a that contains two objects. > [!NOTE] > 此示例显式创建对象的最后两个项，因为并继承类。The example explicitly creates objects for the last two items because and inherit from the class. 默认样式设置属性。The default style for the sets the property. 子对象继承属性值明确创建，这通常是所需的行为。The child objects inherit the property value from the explicitly created , which is typically the desired behavior. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#17)] 下面的示例创建为。The following example creates a for a . [!code-xaml[HeaderedItemsControl#HeaderedItemsControl_Style](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedItemsControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headereditemscontrol_style)] [!code-xaml[HeaderedItemsControl#HeaderedItemsControl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedItemsControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headereditemscontrol)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`null`，此属性返回`false`。If the property is `null`, this property returns `false`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性来确定控件是否有标头。The following example shows how to use this property to determine whether the control has a header. remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为属性属于类型，没有任何限制可在将。Because the property is of type , there are no restrictions on what you can put in the . 情况下将显示，后者位于的。The is displayed by a , which is in the of the . 详细了解如何将显示，请参阅。For more information about how the displays the , see . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *headerString**headerString* 要用作标题的字符串。The string to use as a heading. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建和使用一个页眉模板来指定页眉的外观。The following example shows how to create and use a header template to specify the appearance of the header. [!code-xaml[HeaderedItemsControl#HeaderedItemsControl_Style](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedItemsControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headereditemscontrol_style)] [!code-xaml[HeaderedItemsControl#HeaderedItemsControl_Template1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedItemsControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headereditemscontrol_template1)] [!code-xaml[HeaderedItemsControl#HeaderedItemsControl_Template2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedItemsControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headereditemscontrol_template2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于显示控件标题的内容的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template used to display the contents of the control's header.

value.span: 用于显示控件标题的数据模板。

span.span: A data template used to display a control's header.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要自定义的标题，将此属性设置为。To customize the heading of the , set this property to a . 有关数据模板的详细信息，请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information on data templates, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *TemplateResourceKey**TemplateResourceKey* 标识所请求的模板的键。The key that identifies the template being requested. 键引用中的现有资源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 属性元素语法就从技术上讲，但不是建议这样做。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 请参阅[内联样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md). 绑定引用使用，或者也是可行的但不常见。A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建和使用一个页眉模板来指定页眉的外观。The following example shows how to create and use a header template to specify the appearance of the header. [!code-xaml[HeaderedItemsControl#HeaderedItemsControl_Style](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedItemsControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headereditemscontrol_style)] [!code-xaml[HeaderedItemsControl#HeaderedItemsControl_Template1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedItemsControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headereditemscontrol_template1)] [!code-xaml[HeaderedItemsControl#HeaderedItemsControl_Template2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedItemsControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headereditemscontrol_template2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象为用来显示每个项的标题的模板提供自定义选择逻辑。

span.span: Gets or sets the object that provides custom selection logic for a template used to display the header of each item.
A data template selector.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，创建时有多个为同一类型的对象，并且您想要提供您自己的逻辑来选择应用基于每个数据对象的属性。Typically, you create a when you have more than one for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a to apply based on the properties of each data object. 请注意，如果有不同的对象类型，您可以设置属性上的。Note that if you have objects of different types you can set the property on the . 如果您这样做，则无需创建。If you do that, then there is no need to create a . 此外，如果对象的类型相同但具有不同的属性，还可以考虑使用或数据转换器。Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a or a data converter. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). 若要创建一个模板选择器，创建一个类继承自并重写方法。To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from and override the method. 您的类定义后，可以将类的实例分配给您的元素的模板选择器属性。After your class is defined, you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element. 如果这两个和设置属性，将忽略模板选择器属性。If both the and the properties are set, the template selector property is ignored. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation**MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* 一个类派生自实现实用的重写。A class derived from that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 WPF XAML Namespace 映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey**DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* 标识选择器实现所请求的键。The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested. 该密钥是指派生类实现在实际的重写。The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 WPF XAML Namespace 映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). 你可以以编程方式添加的实例在作为资源的资源字典的类。You can also programmatically add an instance of your class as a resource to a resource dictionary. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回一个字符串，包含有关标头属性和中的项的数量信息属性。This method returns a string that contains information about the header property and the number of items in the property.
